Gold.name: Gold
Gold.description: This coin, minted from tin and gold, is currently the most popular currency across the land.

FakeDiamond.name: Dark Crystal
FakeDiamond.description: Contains unstable energy and is sometimes used as a power source. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.

Diamond.name: Tanium
Diamond.description: Stable crystals, most commonly used for energy supply. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.

AchievementScore.name: Achievement
AchievementScore.description: Points gained after accomplishing an achievement. Accumulate achievement and claim rewards on the achievement page.

WormholeCoin.name: Mira
WormholeCoin.description: The currency issued by and circulates in Mirroria. Can be used on vending machines, service stations, restaurants, and other facilities across Mirroria.

Gem.name: Activation Core I
Gem.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.

ArtifactCoin.name: Activation Core II
ArtifactCoin.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.

EquipFragment.name: Base Chip
EquipFragment.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

WormholeLuckyCoin.name: Proof of Stellarway
WormholeLuckyCoin.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.

SoloLeagueCoin.name: Veron
SoloLeagueCoin.description: Old Mirroria currency that is already out of circulation. It's said that you can still use these coins on some gachapon machines.

Gem2.name: Spring Stamp
Gem2.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.

Gem3.name: Aidan Coin
Gem3.description: Event Currency for Road of Strife

LocalReputation1.name: Astra bounty coin
LocalReputation1.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of a crashed airship. Can be used to exchange for special items.

HookCloneAssistContribution.name: Support points
HookCloneAssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped new Wanderers. Imprinted with an image for mutual support. Join Team Support System to get.

PrimaryEnergy.name: Heat Wave Coin
PrimaryEnergy.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges's residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.

WeaponFragment.name: Black Gold
WeaponFragment.description: Token forged by smiths from old Omnium weapons. Circulated only in special markets. Redeemable for weapons.

GenePointAttack.name: Dominium
GenePointAttack.description: A common currency and the only legal currency of Domain 9 issued by Zhen Gong. It contains a small amount of the material used to make timestamps as an anti-counterfeiting measure.

PrimaryEnergy2.name: Energy Crystal Dust
PrimaryEnergy2.description: Miniature energy crystals generated when using a suppressor, which are worth collecting. Use them to exchange for resources at the Store.

GuildMeritorious.name: Merit
GuildMeritorious.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

LifeCrystal.name: Race point
LifeCrystal.description: Obtained by participating in group races.

HomeOre.name: Metal Material
HomeOre.description: Collected from machine pods or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store Workshop and building upgrades.

HomePumpkin.name: Fiber Material
HomePumpkin.description: Collected from the Pumpkin House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeRattan.name: Energy Material
HomeRattan.description: Collected from the Pawpaw House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeMeat.name: Supply Materials
HomeMeat.description: Collected from the Kitty House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeTwigs.name: Accessory Materials
HomeTwigs.description: Collected from the Turtle House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeFish.name: Quality Materials
HomeFish.description: Dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (Ravagers, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa). Can be used to upgrade the Exchange Store, Workshop, and buildings.

HomeFishBones.name: Composite Materials
HomeFishBones.description: Dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (Ravagers, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa). Can be used to upgrade the Exchange Store, Workshop, and buildings.

HomeShellfish.name: Tech Store Token
HomeShellfish.description: A universal token of Banges Tech. Can be exchanged and used in the Exchange Store.

GenePointAssist.name: Originum (Support)
GenePointAssist.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

GenePointDef.name: Originum (Feature)
GenePointDef.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

RegressionCoin.name: Raid Coin
RegressionCoin.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a mechanical windmill relief. Use them to exchange for resources at the Return Shop.

PrimaryEnergy3.name: Energy Crystal Dust
PrimaryEnergy3.description: Miniature energy crystals generated when using a suppressor, which are worth collecting. Use them to exchange for resources at the Store.

PrimaryEnergy4.name: Energy Crystal Dust
PrimaryEnergy4.description: Miniature energy crystals generated when using a suppressor, which are worth collecting. Use them to exchange for resources at the Store.

HopkinsOrder1.name: Gold-backed card
HopkinsOrder1.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.

SharePhotoCoin.name: Amusement park
SharePhotoCoin.description: Obtained by playing amusement facilities on the Cetus Island. Use them to exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards at Enfi on the island.

WeaponFragmentUP1.name: Flame gold (Red Lotus)
WeaponFragmentUP1.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

WeaponFragmentUP2.name: Flame Gold (Blaze)
WeaponFragmentUP2.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

EquipFragmentUP1.name: Overclocking Chip (Red Lotus)
EquipFragmentUP1.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

EquipFragmentUP2.name: Overclocking Chip (Blaze)
EquipFragmentUP2.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

HopkinsOrder2.name: Proof of credit
HopkinsOrder2.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.

IncarnationCoin.name: Offering points
IncarnationCoin.description: Special tokens minted by Hykros to encourage collecting mana bio samples.

WeaponFragmentUP3.name: Flame gold (White Moon)
WeaponFragmentUP3.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

WeaponFragmentUP9.name: Flame Gold (Shadow)
WeaponFragmentUP9.description:
Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel. Redeemable for limited weapons.
Dazzling lights refracted endlessly yet frighteningly never fade away.

EquipFragmentUP3.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

EquipFragmentUP9.description:
Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for limited Matrix chips.
—So I can share all the clear night full of stars with everyone...

IncarnationCoin1.name: Balance Token
IncarnationCoin1.description: Has the current ecological environment stabilized?

IncarnationCoin2.name: Encrypted Disk
IncarnationCoin2.description: A heavily encrypted disk with critical data. Maybe someone in Hykros can crack it...?

IncarnationCoin3.name: Proof of Contribution
IncarnationCoin3.description: The certificate made by the Hykros Logistics Department, which records the efforts and contributions of the Executor.

GameActivityCoin1.name: Proof of Light
GameActivityCoin1.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.

GameActivityCoin2.name: Exhibition Coupon
GameActivityCoin2.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.

GameActivityCoin3.name: Spacetime Crystal Dust
GameActivityCoin3.description: Crystal dust that escaped from the trajectory of spacetime. Seems to be able to affect the stability of spacetime fragments.

GameActivityCoin4.name: Spacetime Crystal Fragments
GameActivityCoin4.description: These fragments floating in the trajectory of spacetime operations are the products of the collapse of shattered spacetime.

GameActivityCoin5.name: Activation Core I
GameActivityCoin5.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.

GameActivityCoin6.name: Revitalized Energy Body
GameActivityCoin6.description: Revitalized energy body from the defeated raiding target. It may be of great interest to the researchers at Hykros.

GameActivityCoin7.name: Pacemaker Emblem
GameActivityCoin7.description: The emblem is given to the HOTTA Studio's Mirroria Tour event participants. Appreciate Mirroria's beauty from a whole new perspective.

GameActivityCoin8.name: Star scatter
GameActivityCoin8.description: Fine shards of stars that refract the light from outer space.

GameActivityCoin10.name: Enigmatic Badge
GameActivityCoin10.description: The badge given to the HOTTA Studio's Enigmatic Lattice event participants. Come one, come all!

RegressionHelpCoin.name: Return Support Points
RegressionHelpCoin.description: Awarded to those who helped return Executors. Obtain by teaming up with returning Executors and participating in gameplay.
